interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/06/27
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brett Haley'], 'Producers': ['Brett Haley', 'Rebecca Green', 'Laura D. Smith Ireland'], 'Starring': ['Blythe Danner', 'Martin Starr', 'June Squibb'], 'Studio': ['PREFERRED CONTENT']}
Review Text: It is always sad to see decent actors/actresses make a terrible movie just to get a payday, but in this case I'm afraid that's what happened.  The plot is totally without imagination, there are only a few humorous parts, the overall effect is one of boredom coupled with nearly complete lack of passion and emotion.  The solitary good point is there isn't anything offensive about it.  Of course, if you read what I've written, you already know there isn't much about it at all.  Save your time.  There are much better alternatives.
Review Title: Save your time, please...
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
